items.title: Metascience Conference
items.description: A global gathering for knowledge sharing, community building, and opportunities to define a roadmap of research and intervention priorities to accelerate science.  (Description taken from event website)

items.title: LIBER 2025
items.description: A leading forum for research library professionals to explore how libraries can drive innovation, foster collaboration, and address global challenges through open science, equitable access, and sustainable development.

items.title: Open Science: Monitoring Progress, Assessing Impact
items.description: A global gathering of open science stakeholders to share evidence, refine monitoring tools, and advance collaborative strategies for assessing the impact of open science initiatives.

items.title: Bioinformatics Open Source Conference (BOSC) 2025
items.description: A community-focused conference exploring open source bioinformatics, featuring sessions on open data, reproducibility, and data sustainability, along with interdisciplinary collaboration.

items.title: Free and Open Source Software Conference (FrOSCon)
items.description: A community-driven conference showcasing the latest in free and open source software, with talks and workshops on digital sovereignty, AI, open science, and emerging tech trends.

items.title: IFLA World Library and Information Congress
items.description: An international conference for library and information professionals, focusing on advancing equitable access to knowledge, fostering innovation, and building sustainable futures through global collaboration.

items.title: Conference on Research Data Infrastructure (CoRDI)
items.description: A conference highlighting innovations in research data management, featuring sessions on data literacy, infrastructure, and the societal impact of effective data practices.

items.title: STI-ENID 2025 â€“ 29th Annual International Conference on Science and Technology Indicators
items.description: A forum for research library professionals to explore how libraries can drive innovation, foster collaboration, and address global challenges through open science, equitable access, and sustainable development.

items.title: Open Science Fair
items.description: A collaborative forum uniting global open science communities to explore inclusive partnerships, innovative infrastructures, and policies that drive transparent and equitable research practices.

items.title: Open Science and AI Conference 2025
items.description: A global forum for open science stakeholders to explore the intersection of open science and artificial intelligence, addressing challenges and opportunities in transparency, reproducibility, and responsible research practices.

items.title: International Data Week and Research Data Alliance
items.description: A global event uniting data professionals, researchers, and policymakers to explore how data can drive positive societal change, with a focus on ethical governance, open science, and inclusive innovation.

items.title: European Open Science Cloud (EOSC) Symposium 2025
items.description: An event for the European Open Science community, dedicated to advancing the EOSC Federation through strategic collaboration, shared infrastructure, and real-world scientific use cases.
